item.description:
Danbury Gun Show
Danbury Plaza 06877

Peter Schiff will be at the Gun Show!

On January 9th & 10th, the local chapters of The John Birch Society will be setting up an information table at Big Al's Gun show at the Dan Bury Plaza, in Danbury CT. We will be distributing and selling magaines, flyers and DVD's.

The gun show hours run from 9:00 AM- 5:00 PM on Saturday & from 9:00 - 3:00 PM on Sunday.

Any JBS members who are interested in working a few hours at this event should contact Kip Webster through this meetup site.

Anyone who is interested in learning more about The John Birch Society, are welcome to stop by and visit our booth.

Kip Webster
item.name: Gun Show in Danbury! Peter Schiff will be there!
